text: @GOP @Mike_Pence And, hopefully, Congress, will (eventually) get to the bottom of what happened in the Trump WH, & why we were not prepared for a pandemic. Make no mistake - the US public, in November, will hold Trump & his admin accountable for the debacle of this admin's coronavirus response.
